Yeah, that oughta work (<— more sarcasm).

PSS...If I missed any other tax hikes, lemme know.
author: andyroth

text: In summary - the new governor wants to reduce the budget deficit created by politicians over several years who are addicting to wasteful, big government spending not by cutting spending, but by raising multiple tax hikes and ignoring the pension crisis.
author: andyroth

text: The state’s unfunded pension is a serious problem that should get shored up.  But the governor wants to delay pension funding in order to reduce (but not completely close up) the budget shortfall.  In other words, he wants to kick the can.
author: andyroth

text: TAX HIKE #12:  Looks like the governor also wants to enact an “assessment program” (i.e. tax) on health insurance companies through Medicaid.  Someone call the Guinness Book of World Records.  This has to be record number of tax hikes, amirite?
author: andyroth

text: TAX HIKE #11: The governor wants to phase out a tax credit for a private school scholarship program.
author: andyroth

text: TAX HIKE #10:  The governor wants to raise millions in more revenue from an amnesty-type program for delinquent tax filers.  This sounds like harsher enforcement, eh?
author: andyroth

text: TAX HIKE #9:  The governor wants to cut spending...haha...just kidding.  The governor wants to raise state income taxes on foreign income.
author: andyroth

text: TAX HIKE #8:  OMG, please...when will this stop?  The governor wants to reduce the deduction that retailers get for collecting the state sales tax.  So basically the governor wants to give businesses a pay cut for being involuntary tax collectors.
author: andyroth

text: TAX HIKE #7:  This is exhausting, but we must keep going. The governor wants a “higher tax structure” on “successful video game terminals” that will raise $89 million in more tax revenue.
author: andyroth

text: TAX HIKE #6:  He wants to tax sport betting, which is now legal.  Thankfully, only rich people bet on sports (<—sarcasm).
author: andyroth

text: TAX HIKE #5:  You thought his new tax ideas were done, right?  Wrong!  He wants to a new tax on plastic bags.  Whew.  That’s a lot of tax hikes.  Now, let’s talk about the governor’s spending cuts.  What?  There are more tax hikes?  Yes!
author: andyroth

text: TAX HIKE #4: He also wants to legalize marijuana and tax the smoke out of that.
author: andyroth

text: TAX HIKE #3: ...and a tax hike on regular old smelly cigarettes.  But that’s not all.
author: andyroth

text: TAX HIKE #2: He promises not to raise taxes on working class people, buuuut, he’s proposing a new tax on e-cigarettes...
author: andyroth

text: TAX HIKE #1: He wants to get rid of the state’s flat income tax (constitutionally mandated) and replace it with a progressive tax structure.  In other words, a tax hike on upper income people.
author: andyroth
